title: (Pwn2Own) Samsung Galaxy S21 Improper Error Handling Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows network-adjacent attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Samsung Galaxy S21 phones. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability in that the target must visit a malicious page.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of errors when accessing trusted URLs. An attacker can force a page redirection from HTTPS to HTTP. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current user.
addtionnal_details: The patch was applied in server side on November 30th, 2021
timeline:
2021-12-30 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2022-02-18 - Coordinated public release of advisory
